item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @arve arve
item.description:
@arve wrote:

ok i just added a pk system to my server
and it workz perfect.

exept one thing…

when i kill someone i dont get points…

but when i die i loose…

so this is my code

killerz.pkPoints += 2;

and i havew placed it here :

if (!IsInFightCave() && !isInPitGame() && !isInPitRoom() && playerRights != 2 && playerRights != 3 && playerRights != 4 && action != 1 && deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 1500) { client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId]; youdied(); killerz.sM("You have defeated "+playerName+"."); killerz.pkPoints += 2; updateRequired = true; followingh = false; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

help pl0x ?
